TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
If you can lift it, then you can keep it.

Waiter, Some icecream for dessert please.

Your ticket to Minmus, sir.

Bartender! Ask me something.

What soup would you like sir?

Waiter, is that a fruit loop in my soup?

Yes, it is. You ordered cereal, one of the more exotic soups.

Waiter, why is my soup glowing?

The Fallout series has started this week.

Bartender! Are you a ghoul?

What is it to ya, smooth skin?

Waiter, There are Iguana Bits in my Squirrel stew.

Yes, the squirells now hunt iguanas.

Waiter! Do you have fresh Andale pies?

No, but we do have Sweeny Todd pies.

Waiter, that previous customer tried to chew on me.

Yes, we call him Chewie.

Waiter! Don't you have Geiger counters on your tables?

Yes, but the customers complained about the clicking noise.

Waiter, all the old Geiger counters from the tables appeared in my soup!

You should not splash your soup against the counter. A finger, wet of soup, is enough.

Waiter! Which head of brahmin is it?

Depends on whether you are left or right handed.

Waiter, is that a glowing finger in my soup?

Better ask, why the steak is blinking.

Cashier! Do you accept foreign currency?

Spoiler

We don't even accept Sultanas.

Waiter, my spoon melted when I put it in my soup.

Maybe you should not add so much species to it.

Waiter! What's your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. meal?

Soup, Pie, Eclair, Calzone, Ice-cream, Anchovies and Lasagne.

Waiter, a bucket to go thanks.

Here you go, sir. It'sour bucket for bucks.

Waiter! Why do you want the tips? Are you an archer?

Because cow tipping is all the rage.

Waiter, why are you bobbing for apples, in my soup?

Because this is not waiter! He is Robin the Bobbin!

Spoiler

Robin the Bobbin, the big-bellied Ben,
He ate more meat than fourscore men;
He ate a cow, he ate a calf,
He ate a butcher and a half;
He ate a church, he ate a steeple,
He ate the priest and all the people!
A cow and a calf,
An ox and a half,
A church and a steeple,
And all the good people,
And yet he complained that his stomach wasn't full.


Robin! Where is the waiter?!

Edited April 22 by kerbiloid

Hello Robin, where did all the other people go?

Ah, Robin, why are you looking at me and salivating?

Because you are standing between him and the police car with three inside.

Bartender! Is your bar a statusbar, a progressbar, a toolbar, or a dance bar?

Yes to all the above.

Waiter, I have a great idea for soup.

"Waiter, the soup was not good. Please do not listen to me when it comes to soup ideas."

BA-Forums, shortly after horribly attempting to make one of @ColdJ's soups, as I do not know how to make a soup.

We know that now. Happily we still have a chance to try another one.

Waiter! A bottle of radium water, to disinfect and empty the stomach and the belly.

Here you go, would you like some RadAway to go with that?

Waiter, Fallout Boy is playing in my soup.
